short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracking and transforming any part of web content in real-time with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anyveo allows you to easily create dozens of blocks that can be viewed, tracked and transformed in real time simultaneously, and sends you notifications
